TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelReceiver implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel

summary.span: Stellt erforderliche Funktionen und Eigenschaften für die Empfängerchannel bereit.

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for the receiver channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Der Empfangsseite Kanäle verfügbar machen muss die Schnittstelle.The receiving side of channels must expose the interface. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CPP/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CS/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/VB/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.vb#1)]

exception.span: Der direkte Aufrufer verfügt nicht über die Berechtigung für die Infrastruktur.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed

summary.span: Weist den aktuellen Channel an, mit der Überwachung von Anforderungen zu beginnen.

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Das Datenobjekt kann verwendet werden, bestimmte Initialisierungszustand an den Kanal zu übergeben.The data object can be used to pass specific initialization state to the channel. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CPP/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/CS/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.cs#4)] [!code-vb[IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IChannelReceiver_StartListening_ChannelData/VB/ichannelreceiver_channeldata_server.vb#4)]

exception.span: Der direkte Aufrufer verfügt nicht über die Berechtigung für die Infrastruktur.

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: Weist den aktuellen Channel an, die Überwachung von Anforderungen zu beenden.

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Das Datenobjekt kann verwendet werden, zu den bestimmten Zustand in den Kanal zu übergeben.The data object can be used to pass the specific state to the channel. ## Examples [!code-cpp[HttpServerChannel_Server_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpServerChannel_Server_Client/CPP/httpserverchannel_9_server.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[HttpServerChannel_Server_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpServerChannel_Server_Client/CS/httpserverchannel_9_server.cs#3)] [!code-vb[HttpServerChannel_Server_Client#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpServerChannel_Server_Client/VB/httpserverchannel_9_server.vb#3)]

exception.span: Der direkte Aufrufer verfügt nicht über die Berechtigung für die Infrastruktur.

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
